attribute.name.generic.armor_toughness.d: Reduces the effectiveness of enemy armor reduction.
attribute.name.generic.attack_damage.des: Physical damage dealt with a fully charged attack.
How far your melee attacks knock back foes, in half-blocks.
attribute.name.generic.attack_speed.desc: How many fully charged attacks you can execute per second.
attribute.name.generic.luck.desc: Increases the likelihood of good things happening.
attribute.name.generic.max_health.desc: How many hit points you can have.
porting_lib.entity_reach.desc: How far you can interact with entities, in blocks.
porting_lib.entity_gravity.desc: Acceleration towrds the ground, in blocks/sÂ²
porting_lib.name_tag_distance.desc: How far away another player must be to see your name.
porting_lib.block_reach.desc: How far you can interact with blocks, in blocks.
porting_lib.step_height_addition.desc: How many blocks you may step up without jumping.
porting_lib.swim_speed.desc: How fast you swim, relative to normal.
zenith_attributes:draw_speed.desc: How fast you draw ranged weapons, such as bows, crossbows, or tridents.
zenith_attributes:crit_chance.desc: The chance any damage you deal critically strikes, dealing extra damage based on your Crit Damage.
zenith_attributes:crit_damage.desc: Damage multiplier for critical hits, including vanilla jump crits.
zenith_attributes:cold_damage.desc: Bonus magic damage applied on melee attacks, and slows enemies hit.
zenith_attributes:fire_damage.desc: Bonus magic damage applied on melee attacks, and burns enemies hit.
zenith_attributes:life_steal.desc: Percentage of post-mitigation damage which will heal you.
zenith_attributes:current_hp_damage.desc: Bonus physical damage applied on melee attacks, based on the target's health.
zenith_attributes:overheal.desc: Percentage of post-mitigation damage which will grant you an absorption shield.
zenith_attributes:mining_speed.desc: How fast you mine blocks, compared to normal.
zenith_attributes:arrow_damage.desc: Damage multiplier for arrows. Tridents are arrows.
zenith_attributes:arrow_velocity.desc: Speed multiplier for arrows. Arrow damage scales with velocity.
zenith_attributes:experience_gained.desc: Multiplier on how much experience you gain from breaking blocks and killing mobs.
zenith_attributes:armor_pierce.desc: Flat reduction to the target's armor value.
zenith_attributes:armor_shred.desc: Percentage reduction to the target's armor value.
zenith_attributes:prot_pierce.desc: Flat reduction to the target's protection point total.
zenith_attributes:prot_shred.desc: Percentage reduction to the target's protection point total.
zenith_attributes:dodge_chance.desc: Chance to dodge a melee attack or a projectile.
zenith_attributes:elytra_flight.desc: If you can fly as if wearing an Elytra.
zenith_attributes:creative_flight.desc: If you can fly as if in Creative Mode.
comment_id: MobFx - descriptions are duplicated for JEED support.
effect.zenith_attributes.knowledge.desc: Increases experience gained from kills and blocks.
effect.zenith_attributes.knowledge.descr: Increases experience gained from kills and blocks.
effect.zenith_attributes.detonation.desc: On expiry, inflicts damage based on remaining fire ticks.
On expiry, inflicts damage based on remaining fire ticks.
effect.minecraft.night_vision.desc: Allows you to see in the dark.
effect.minecraft.fire_resistance.desc: Makes you immune to fire damage.
effect.minecraft.water_breathing.desc: Causes you to be unable to drown.
effect.minecraft.instant_health.desc: Instantly restores a bit of your health.
effect.minecraft.instant_damage.desc: Instantly causes a bit of magic damage.
effect.minecraft.regeneration.desc: Causes you to regenerate health over time.
